name: Attuned_Preventive_Medicine_E
display_help: Enhances the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Healing and Damage Absorption effects and reduces Recharge Time and Endurance Cost
